Text: Taku Job dohi kakini:
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ ame̩ akpa mi e̩do̩ bie̩ kade taa?
Onu me̩gwa ku me̩ bʼumi ina de̩;
I chaka chʼochochi ka kʼomi la me̩,
I la che̩wñ kʼame̩ ahi o̩la-me̩ ne ñw mi,
mak a me̩ ki ma ka kʼO̩jo̩ mʼo̩la-mi rida,
Go, omi akwa kakini, Elelelele-o! E̩ne̩ du la agbo̩ n;
I fʼo̩gba kpa nyʼo̩na-mi, u la neke legudu n,
I mʼojima-mi gwojane̩ bʼumi o̩la te̩,
I agu umi lo̩ o̩wo̩ tʼo̩wo̩ du, u le me̩,
I laño̩ fʼuna uwe̩do̩-wñ tajo bʼumi ma,
Abogu-wñ awa;
I mʼamo̩maye-mi ko rʼo̩najiji ñw mi,
Amefu-mi jʼatʼugbo mi n, abo ku ma ma mi chaka la gbenyo̩ mi;
abo ku ma ge̩ne̩ ef unyi-mi;
Nadʼadu-mi omu, i la adʼohi ñw mi n;
Afu ki kwef iñmo̩-mi chʼejaduña ñw o̩ya-mi,
I chaka chʼabimo̩to̩ egini, ma chʼe̩de̩te̩ mi;
Amonuku-mi o̩lali chaka hihie̩ne̩ mi,
Achiku-mi gamʼaño̩-mi kpʼo̩re̩la-mi,
Li umi ejumomi, li umi ejumomi, O, ame̩ amonuku-mi,
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ doli mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼame̩ chʼO̩jo̩?
O, ma ma fʼo̩la-mi ko̩ nyʼo̩takada!
Ku ma ma nʼiko ebije kpai o̩de̩le̩-ma
Todu u chema ka kʼAnache̩-mi deju,
oñ e̩gba kʼaño̩ o̩la-mi-i kpabie̩ rinyo̩,
e-kʼeju-mi onugo ali ka kʼi dʼubi-mi,
Iche̩wñ kʼame̩ kakini, A ñʼadoli-wñ ta!
ame̩ onugo ki chokpo o̩kwo̩chageli,
